languages.text: "Только не нужно так на меня смотреть, шерин! Заговоры высоких господ, интриги {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}футфольских{/g} ублюдков, тайны ксеноартефактов, раболепие перед зажравшейся Экклезиархией... Все сгинуло, словно сон, за пределами сего места! В горячке боя за собственную жизнь, когда рвешь душу в клочья, а тело в кровь... Разве не простительно быть самой собой, шерин?" {n}Джай смотрит на вас отчаянно, почти почти умоляюще.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Только не нужно так на меня смотреть, шерин! Заговоры высоких господ, интриги {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}футфольских{/g} ублюдков, тайны ксеноартефактов, раболепие перед зажравшейся экклезиархией... Все сгинуло, словно сон, за пределами сего места! В горячке боя за собственную жизнь, когда рвешь душу в клочья, а тело в кровь... Разве не простительно быть самой собой, шерин?" {n}Джай смотрит на вас отчаянно, почти почти умоляюще.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Don't give me that look, shereen! The plotting nobles, the scheming {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} thugs, the mysteries of xeno-artefacts, the bowing and scraping before the self-indulgent Ecclesiarchy... All that's gone! Everything beyond these walls, melted away like a dream! I'm fighting for my life, my soul's being torn to shreds and my body's bleeding... Is it too much to ask to want to be myself, shereen?" {n}Jae looks at you desperately, almost pleadingly.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Только не нужно так на меня смотреть, шерин! Заговоры высоких господ, интриги {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}футфольских{/g} ублюдков, тайны ксеноартефактов, раболепие перед зажравшейся Экклезиархией... Все сгинуло, словно сон, за пределами сего места! В горячке боя за собственную жизнь, когда рвешь душу в клочья, а тело в кровь... Разве не простительно быть самой собой, шерин?" {n}Джай смотрит на вас отчаянно, почти почти умоляюще.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You don't have to look at me like that, shereen! Highborn conspiracies, {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} schemers, xeno-artefact mysteries, grovelling before the self-indulgent Ecclesiarchy... Everything not out of this place was gone like a fever dream! When you are fighting for your life, when your soul is being torn to shreds and your body is bleeding... Will you not forgive me for being myself, shereen?" {n}Jae is looking at you desperately, almost pleadingly.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You don't have to look at me like that, shereen! Is it too much to ask to want to be myself, shereen?" {n}Jae looks at you desperately, almost pleadingly.{/n}

languages.text: “别那样看着我，亲爱的！那些勾心斗角的贵族，酝酿阴谋的{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}暴徒，神秘的异形造物，以及面对骄奢淫逸的国教时卑躬屈膝的态度……这一切都消失了！墙外的一切，都像梦境一样融化了！我正在为了我自己的生命而战。我的灵魂被慢慢撕成碎片，身体也在流着血……我只是想做我自己而已，难道这样的要求太奢侈了吗，亲爱的？”{n}婕伊渴切地看着你，目光中几乎带着恳求。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Don't give me that look, shereen! The plotting nobles, the scheming {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} thugs, the mysteries of xeno-artefacts, the bowing and scraping before the self-indulgent Ecclesiarchy... All that's gone! Everything beyond these walls, melted away like a dream! I'm fighting for my life, my soul's being torn to shreds and my body's bleeding... Is it too much to ask to want to be myself, shereen?" {n}Jae looks at you desperately, almost pleadingly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “别那样看着我，亲爱的！那些勾心斗角的贵族，酝酿阴谋的{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}暴徒，神秘的异形造物，以及面对骄奢淫逸的国教时卑躬屈膝的态度……这一切都消失了！墙外的一切，都像梦境一样融化了！我正在为了我自己的生命而战。我的灵魂被慢慢撕成碎片，身体也在流着血……我只是想做我自己而已，难道这样的要求太奢侈了吗，亲爱的？”{n}婕伊渴切地看着你，目光中几乎带着恳求。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Don't give me that look, shereen! The plotting nobles, the scheming Footfall thugs, the mysteries of xeno-artefacts, the bowing and scraping before the self-indulgent Ecclesiarchy... All that's gone! Everything beyond these walls, melted away like a dream! I'm fighting for my life, my soul's being torn to shreds and my body's bleeding... Is it too much to ask to want to be myself, shereen?" {n}Jae looks at you desperately, almost pleadingly.{/n}

languages.text: «¡No me mire así, shereen! Los nobles traicioneros, los matones intrigantes de {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}, los misterios de los artefactos xenos, el arrastrarse y besar el suelo ante la decadente Eclesiarquía... ¡Todo eso se acabó! ¡Todo lo que hay más allá de estos mundos se ha derretido como un sueño! Estoy luchando por mi vida, mi alma está hecha jirones y mi cuerpo sangra por todas partes... ¿Es mucho pedir que sea yo misma, shereen?». {n}Jae te mira con desesperación, casi suplicante.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Don't give me that look, shereen! The plotting nobles, the scheming {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} thugs, the mysteries of xeno-artefacts, the bowing and scraping before the self-indulgent Ecclesiarchy... All that's gone! Everything beyond these walls, melted away like a dream! I'm fighting for my life, my soul's being torn to shreds and my body's bleeding... Is it too much to ask to want to be myself, shereen?" {n}Jae looks at you desperately, almost pleadingly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡No me mire así, shereen! Los nobles traicioneros, los matones intrigantes de {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}, los misterios de los artefactos xenos, el arrastrarse y besar el suelo ante la decadente Eclesiarquía... ¡Todo eso se acabó! ¡Todo lo que hay más allá de estos mundos se ha derretido como un sueño! Estoy luchando por mi vida, mi alma está hecha jirones y mi cuerpo sangra por todas partes... ¿Es mucho pedir que sea yo misma, shereen?». {n}Jae te mira con desesperación, casi suplicante.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「そんな顔をしないでよ！謀略をめぐらす貴族たち、{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}の悪党たち、謎めいた異種族のアーティファクトの謎、わがまま帝国聖教会の前でへこへこしたり足掻いたり…すべてがなくなった！この壁の向こうのすべてが、夢のように溶けてしまった！あたしは生きるために戦っているの。魂はズタズタに引き裂かれ、身体は血を流している…自分らしくありたいと願うのは無理難題なのかしら？」{n}ジェイは必死に、懇願するようにあなたを見つめた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Don't give me that look, shereen! The plotting nobles, the scheming {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} thugs, the mysteries of xeno-artefacts, the bowing and scraping before the self-indulgent Ecclesiarchy... All that's gone! Everything beyond these walls, melted away like a dream! I'm fighting for my life, my soul's being torn to shreds and my body's bleeding... Is it too much to ask to want to be myself, shereen?" {n}Jae looks at you desperately, almost pleadingly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そんな顔をしないでよ！謀略をめぐらす貴族たち、{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}の悪党たち、謎めいた異種族のアーティファクトの謎、わがまま帝国聖教会の前でへこへこしたり足掻いたり…すべてがなくなった！この壁の向こうのすべてが、夢のように溶けてしまった！あたしは生きるために戦っているの。魂はズタズタに引き裂かれ、身体は血を流している…自分らしくありたいと願うのは無理難題なのかしら？」{n}ジェイは必死に、懇願するようにあなたを見つめた。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Seht mich nicht so an, Shereen! Die intriganten Adligen, die durchtriebenen Gauner von {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}, die Mysterien der Xeno-Artefakte, das Gebuckle und Gekrieche vor der maßlosen Ekklesiarchie ... All das ist fort! Alles jenseits dieser Wände, weggeschmolzen wie ein Traum! Ich kämpfe um mein Leben, meine Seele wird in Stücke gerissen, mein Körper blutet ... Ist es da zu viel verlangt, ich selbst sein zu wollen, Shereen?" {n}Jae blickt dich verzweifelt an, fast flehentlich.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Don't give me that look, shereen! The plotting nobles, the scheming {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} thugs, the mysteries of xeno-artefacts, the bowing and scraping before the self-indulgent Ecclesiarchy... All that's gone! Everything beyond these walls, melted away like a dream! I'm fighting for my life, my soul's being torn to shreds and my body's bleeding... Is it too much to ask to want to be myself, shereen?" {n}Jae looks at you desperately, almost pleadingly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Seht mich nicht so an, Shereen! Die intriganten Adligen, die durchtriebenen Gauner von {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}, die Mysterien der Xeno-Artefakte, das Gebuckle und Gekrieche vor der maßlosen Ekklesiarchie ... All das ist fort! Alles jenseits dieser Wände, weggeschmolzen wie ein Traum! Ich kämpfe um mein Leben, meine Seele wird in Stücke gerissen, mein Körper blutet ... Ist es da zu viel verlangt, ich selbst sein zu wollen, Shereen?" {n}Jae blickt dich verzweifelt an, fast flehentlich.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Ne me regardez pas comme ça, shereen ! Les nobles conspirateurs, les malfrats sournois de {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g}, les mystères des xéno-artefacts, les courbettes devant l'Ecclésiarchie complaisante... J'ai tout perdu ! Tout ce qui se trouve au-delà de ces murs s'est volatilisé comme un rêve ! Je me bats pour rester en vie, mon âme se désagrège et mon corps saigne... Vous ne croyez pas que j'ai le droit d'être moi-même, pour une fois ? » {n}Jae vous lance un regard désespéré, presque suppliant.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Don't give me that look, shereen! The plotting nobles, the scheming {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} thugs, the mysteries of xeno-artefacts, the bowing and scraping before the self-indulgent Ecclesiarchy... All that's gone! Everything beyond these walls, melted away like a dream! I'm fighting for my life, my soul's being torn to shreds and my body's bleeding... Is it too much to ask to want to be myself, shereen?" {n}Jae looks at you desperately, almost pleadingly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ne me regardez pas comme ça, shereen ! Les nobles conspirateurs, les malfrats sournois de {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g}, les mystères des xéno-artefacts, les courbettes devant l'Ecclésiarchie complaisante... J'ai tout perdu ! Tout ce qui se trouve au-delà de ces murs s'est volatilisé comme un rêve ! Je me bats pour rester en vie, mon âme se désagrège et mon corps saigne... Vous ne croyez pas que j'ai le droit d'être moi-même, pour une fois ? » {n}Jae vous lance un regard désespéré, presque suppliant.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Bana öyle bakma şirinim! Sürekli dümen peşindeki soylular, entrikacı {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman{/g} eşkıyaları, zeno eserlerinin gizemleri, karşısında eğilip bükülüp artıklarına muhtaç olduğumuz Ekleşiarşi... Hepsi geçmişte kaldı! Bu duvarların ötesindeki her şey, düş misali kaybolup gitti! Ruhum paramparça, vücudum kanıyor... Canım için savaşıyorum. Kendim olmayı istemek çok mu şirinim?" {n}Jae sana umutsuzca, âdeta yalvarırcasına bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Don't give me that look, shereen! The plotting nobles, the scheming {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} thugs, the mysteries of xeno-artefacts, the bowing and scraping before the self-indulgent Ecclesiarchy... All that's gone! Everything beyond these walls, melted away like a dream! I'm fighting for my life, my soul's being torn to shreds and my body's bleeding... Is it too much to ask to want to be myself, shereen?" {n}Jae looks at you desperately, almost pleadingly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bana öyle bakma şirinim! Sürekli dümen peşindeki soylular, entrikacı {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman{/g} serserileri, zeno eserlerinin gizemleri, sadece kendini düşünen Ekleşiarşi'nin karşısında eğilip, artıklarından beslenme. Hepsi geçmişte kaldı! Bu duvarların ötesindeki her şey bir rüya gibi solup gitti! Ölmemek için savaşıyorum, ruhum paramparça hâlde ve bedenimden kanlar akıyor. Kendim olmayı istemek çok mu şirinim?" {n}Jae sana umutsuzca, âdeta yalvarırcasına bakıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
